title: How to limit certain types of ads on YouTube
content:
See fewer sensitive ads on YouTube

Recently, Google has been exercising its ability to help users fine-tune the type of content they want to see. That includes ads that you come across while browsing online and viewing content on YouTube. Google now lets your turn off and limit certain types of sensitive ads. Here’s how.
